metadata.title: CVE-2016-5041 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
dwarf_macro5.c in libdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a debugging informationentry using DWARF5 and without a DW_AT_name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507-1').
